duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain on-site fire safety and Massachusetts State alcohol laws as temporary members of the Student Involvement & Events team within the Office of Campus Life.

Act as gatekeepers, monitors, and policy enforcers at events, and maintain safe alcohol service by verifying identification, performing wristbanding of attendees, and controlling alcohol service and use.
Collaborate with the Event Planner, Office of Campus Life, and Campus Safety and Security to carry out all aspects of the event.
Enlist the aid of Campus Safety, when necessary, to ensure compliance with Massachusetts law and College policy.
Ensure that the event site is cleaned up and furniture is placed in its original location at the end of the event, and dispose of any unsupervised beverage cups throughout the event.
Carry out additional tasks and responsibilities as assigned by the Event Planner and other event team members.

education_certification.credential: TiPS Certification and Massachusetts Crowd Manager Certification provided by the institution
